results.name: Permutation of natural numbers induced by the Catalan bijection gma085159 acting on symbolless S-expressions encoded by A014486/A063171.
comment: This Catalan bijection rotates the interpretations (pp)-(rr) of Stanley, using the "rising slope" mapping illustrated in A085161.
link: A. Karttunen, Gatomorphisms (With the complete Scheme source)
Index entries for signature-permutations induced by Catalan automorphisms
R. P. Stanley, Exercises on Catalan and Related Numbers (including 66 combinatorial interpretations)
program: (Scheme functions implementing this automorphism on list-structures:)
xref: Number of cycles: A054357. Number of fixed points: A046698. (In range [A014137(n-1)..A014138(n-1)] of this permutation, possibly shifted one term left or right).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 23 2003
